titles.title: A resolution providing for consideration of changes to rules for the proceedings of the Senate.
A resolution providing for consideration of changes to rules for the proceedings of the Senate.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

term.name: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration

bill.summary:
Amends Rule V (Suspension and Amendment of the Rules) of the Standing Rules of the Senate to revise Senate proceedings, including, at the beginning of a new Congress, agreement to resolutions that:
appoint majority and minority members of the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration, and amend or adopt rules for Senate proceedings.
